name: MStore API
author: InspireUI

sections.description:
The plugin is used to configure Mstore/FluxStore mobile apps and supports RestAPI to connect to the app.

Fluxstore are universal e-commerce apps inspired by Flutter framework, made by Google. With the mission of reducing thousands of hours of business spent on designing, developing, and testing a mobile app, Fluxstore comes as a complete solution for optimizing to deliver your app to the market with high productivity and cost efficiency. It could be able to satisfy all of the business requirements including e-commerce functionalities, impressive UX design, and smooth performance on both iOS and Android devices.

If your business already has a website built based on WooCommerce, Shopify, Opencart, Magento, Listeo, My Listing, PrestaShop, Notion, BigCommerce, Strapi, or WordPress then it is easy to integrate with Fluxstore in just a few steps, and quickly release the final app to both App Store and Google Play. The download package includes full source code and many related resources (designs, documents, videos…) that help you install in the smoothest way.

Either you are business people with raising sales ambition or developers with faster mobile application creation needs, Fluxstore provides you solutions.
Faster- Smoother- Closer.

Reference links

  • App demo: iOS, Android
  • App Builder: https://fluxbuilder.com
  • Showcase: https://showcase.fluxbuilder.com
  • Company Website: https://inspireui.com
  • Youtube
  • Facebook
  • Document
  • Products
sections.installation:
Manual Installation

  1. Upload the entire /mstore-api directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate ‘MStore API’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Better Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress admin and search for ‘MStore API’.
  2. Click Install.

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Por favor revíselo para que tenga soporte para referencias de compra en la aplicación. </font></font>

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">También deseo que otro complemento llamado SUMO Reward Points: WooCommerce Reward System sea compatible con MStore API </font></font>

This points per purchase plugin is the most complete that is seen of all.

thank you very much for your great work

Bug in sorting products on the website caused by this plugin

By khalil43 on January 8, 2023

The plugin is causing an issue in your website: if you chose a category, then sort product by price for example, then chose another category, the new category will show that products are sorted by price also, but they are sorted by random. if you refresh the page it shows the real sorting by method ( random)

GREAT and awesome plugin!

By frankbaku on January 24, 2022

Thanks!

thanks for great support

By mohamedzaky on January 5, 2022

thanks for great support

Great job!!

By jvagliat on December 22, 2021

Great job!!

Awesome Plugin

By khompetch on December 9, 2021

Awesome Plugin

Better than Expected

By gregkeys on November 18, 2021

I'm using this Mstore api with 3 flutter templates I purchased from inspirui. The support has been stellar, really top notch! What do I mean by top notch? I have submitted 20 tickets to their support, every single ticket was answered within 24 hours (often within an hour or 2 after submission) even though their regular license says they have 48+ hours to respond. Their regular license also says there is a limit of 10 tickets per license yet they continue to answer my requests. Now I would not expect that to be the norm, I expect the license restrictions are there to protect them of abuse, but my experience is that they go above and beyond. Now you might be wondering why I have so many tickets for support, most of them are getting help with things I didnt understand, I needed some hand holding, despite their very thorough documentation to which they gladly helped. I highly recommend this plugin as well as all of their commercial products, they are high quality!

Awesome Plugin

By amahlathini on October 25, 2021

Super Helpful, Made It Very Easy To Integrate My Website With The Mobile APP ❤️
